thread.section_title: Bambi Baby Store - Furniture, Strollers and More! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bambi Baby Store - Furniture, Strollers and More! | bambibaby.com
thread.title: Bill S
thread.title_full: Bambi Baby Store - Furniture, Strollers and More! reviewed by Bill S

author: Bill S
title: Bill S
text: We looked at the Westwood Design collections and found not only a lower price at Bambi Baby but they offered free shipping which saved anywhere from $100 - $150. The items arrived in great condition and were exactly what we wanted. Not only that but they had a financing program to choose from which we took advantage of. Had a shipping delay due to the carrier being a bit lazy but that was no reflection on Bambi Baby. Very pleased.
